title: Jessie O'Neal Courson
content: BYHALIA, MS -- Jessie O'Neal Courson, 9 YEARS OLD, passed away Monday, August 15, 2016, at His home in Byhalia, MS. Services will be on Saturday 8/20/16 at 3:00 p.m. at Cedar Haven Baptist Church, South Byhalia, MS. Visitation will be on 8/20/2016 from 2:00 - 2:50 p.m. at Cedar Haven Baptist Church. Burial will follow at Byhalia City Cemetery.
